code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';const ScrollHandler=()=>{const[activeSection,setActiveSection]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const sections=document.querySelectorAll('section');const scrollY=window.pageYOffset;sections.forEach(current=>{let sectionHeight=current.offsetHeight;let sectionTop=current.offsetTop-50;let id=current.getAttribute("id");if(scrollY>sectionTop&&scrollY<=sectionTop+sectionHeight){setActiveSection(id);}});};window.addEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);};},[]);return null;};export default ScrollHandler;
